title: Advisory issued for thundershowers accompanied by severe lightning
body_lines: Thundershowers accompanied by severe lightning are likely to occur at several places in Central, North-central, Eastern, Uva provinces and in Mannar, Vavuniya, and Mullaitivu districts, the Meteorology Department said in a weather advisory this evening (March 23).
The general public is advised to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by lightning activity.
